name: Flappy Putin - HardBass Gopnik
description:
Do you vote for Putin? Doesn't matter, he get your vote anyway suka.

Flappy Putin is epic Slav from Duma also known as Vladimir Hardbaskov.

If you ever wanted to know how it is to be slav, just play this game suka and rush A because it's Russia.

After you learn how to be a true slav by playing this game, gopniks won't stop you on the street anymore asking what are you wearing because you will have tracksuit.

What music to listen in your blyatmobil - HARD BASS

Stay cheeki breeki.
